Title: Key steps in developing a cognitive vaccine against traumatic flashbacks: Visuospatial tetris versus verbal pub quiz
Author: Holmes, Emily A.; James, Ella L.; Kilford, Emma J.; Deeprose, Catherine
ResultSummary: participants in the Pub Quiz condition experienced a significantly greater number of flashbacks than control

Title: Key steps in developing a cognitive vaccine against traumatic flashbacks: Visuospatial tetris versus verbal pub quiz
Author: Holmes, Emily A.; James, Ella L.; Kilford, Emma J.; Deeprose, Catherine
ResultSummary: The relative increase in flashbacks after Pub Quiz condition compared to the control condition was not significant

Title: Updating versus exposure to prevent consolidation of conditioned fear
